Welcome to DjaoDjin survey's documentation!
===========================================

djaodjin-survey is a Django application that implements the logic to store
qualitative assessments and quantitative measurements of a profile.

Major Features:

- Qualitative assessments
- Absolute and relative quantitative measurements
- Double opt-in portfolios data access control

   :maxdepth: 1

   encoding
